title: Education Data
description: Every place you went for your education.

items.title: Education Entry
items.description: One of the entries that represent a kind of way you did in a period of time.

type.title: Type
type.description: What kind of education was this for?

title.title: Name
title.description: Name of the place you went to (Your school's name or name of the course you got, it is basically a display name for this entry.)

start.title: Start Month
start.description: Month that you started going to this place.

until.title: End Month
until.description: Month that you stopped going/graduated from this place.

location.title: Place Location
location.description: A basic location of this place. You don't have to put an entire address. You can just provide the city and country name, such as "Istanbul / Turkey"
